programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: When it comes to dating, Christina Walters has a golden rule: avoid searching for Mr. Right and focus on Mr. Right Now. That is until one night at a club when she unexpectedly meets Peter, only to see him suddenly disappear the next day. She and her best friend Courtney decide to break the rules and go on a road trip to find him, encountering numerous misadventures along the way(n)

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: Newlyweds John and Jenny Grogan adopt an unruly Labrador puppy who despite being "the world's most disobedient dog" becomes a key part of their lives(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show(n)

programme.title: Biker Boyz
programme.desc: Motorcycle enthusiasts should go hog-wild for this revved-up action flick. Laurence Fishburne is Smoke, president and ace rider of a biker club that engages in illegal street competitions. A young up-and-comer (Derek Luke) with a secret up his sleeve challenges Smoke to become king of the road and the race is on. Orlando Jones, Lisa Bonet, Vanessa Bell Calloway, Kid Rock(n)

programme.title: Every Brilliant Thing
programme.desc: Jonny Donahoe performs in a one-person play about a man who came of age with a suicidal mother but, at various stages of his life, set about compiling a long list of reasons to live. Filmed at the Barrow Street Theatre in New York City in 2015(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: An apartment block janitor discovers a magical woman in the swimming pool, who tells him that she has come from a children's fairytale and needs his help to return home. But something dangerous lurks in the woods as the story begins to take over the lives of the characters(n)

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Two neighbours, who have been bitter rivals ever since a youthful feud over a woman, renew their animosity when an attractive widow moves in across the street. The new arrival is a welcome diversion for the old adversaries, and when they both attempt to woo her, only one can win her affections. When it becomes clear that the widow is interested only in commitment and her new lover has other ideas, she begins to doubt her original decision(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: 05/23/2017. Segments include a report on abuse in youth soccer programs in England; a profile of the Dodgers' Spanish broadcaster Jaime Jarrin; and a visit with Robert Gagno, the autistic defending winner of the World Pinball Championships(n)

programme.desc: Episode 141. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Hugely successful businesswoman Michelle Darnell (Melissa McCarthy) is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she is forced to move in with a long-suffering employee of hers (Kristen Bell), and tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. Peter Dinklage, Kristen Schaal, and Kathy Bates co-star in this comedy, which was directed by Ben Falcone (McCarthy's real-life husband), and co-written by McCarthy, Falcone, and Steve Mallory(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Customer Service. A hunt for financial support takes Richard outside the tech bubble, where he encounters a contentious figure from Pied Piper's past(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting

To complicate matters, two strangers enter the equation: a washed-up shrink who starts to coach Will through his transformation, and a med student who shows him that there can be a pretty face along with his life of the mind(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: In this icy and stylish sci-fi thriller, a dying New York real-estate tycoon (Ben Kingsley) undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man (Ryan Reynolds), but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Hilary Swank adds another outstanding characterization to her Oscar-winning résumé. She plays Holly Kennedy, a young widow whose late husband (Gerard Butler) arranged to have 10 letters delivered posthumously to encourage her to carry on with her life. Directed by Richard LaGravenese, who cowrote the moving script with Steven Rogers. The film is an adaptation of Cecelia Ahern's popular first novel, which she wrote when she was 21(n)

programme.title: 2017 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant runs into an old high-school classmate, an overweight loser-turned-muscular CIA agent, and ends up helping him with a crucial mission involving the hacking of U.S. spy satellites(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A team of incarcerated supervillains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Enchantress, El Diablo and Killer Croc, are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina (Jennifer Saunders) and Patsy (Joanna Lumley) are horrified when they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. Eager to avoid the media's glare, the duo flee to the French Riviera to get away from it all. Directed by Mandie Fletcher(n)

programme.title: The Wizard of Lies
programme.desc: Adaptation of journalist Diana B. Henriques' account of financier Bernie Madoff's orchestration of one of the largest frauds in U.S. history that led to financial ruin for thousands of investors and, in the process, his own family's destruction(n)

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: The youngest child of the family often has the most problems -- so why should things be different for the Prince of Darkness and his offspring? Satan (Harvey Keitel) is considering retirement, and is pondering which of his sons should take over the family business -- ambitious Adrian (Rhys Ifans), strapping Cassius (Tommy "Tiny" Lister Jr.), or Nicky (Adam Sandler), an accident-prone demon who prefers to stay in his room playing his favorite heavy metal tunes. When Satan decides to stay on for another 10,000 years, Adrian is outraged, and leaves Hell to go to New York, where he and Cassius attempt to round up enough souls to vote Satan out of power. Satan, understandably upset, sends Nicky to bring Adrian and Cassius back home, but Nicky finds life on Earth is more complicated than he expected. Things don't get any easier when he develops a crush on Valerie (Patricia Arquette), a good-hearted mortal woman. Little Nicky also features Michael McKean as a city official trying to put Nicky behind bars, Kevin Nealon as Hell's gatekeeper, Rodney Dangerfield as Satan's father, Robert Smigel as the voice of Beefy -- a talking dog who is Nicky's guide on earth, Allen Covert as Todd -- Nicky's new roommate, and Peter Dante and Jonathan Loughran as a pair of metalheads who dig Satan. Jon Lovitz and Reese Witherspoon play cameo roles, and Regis Philbin and Ozzy Osbourne appear as themselves(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Alien: Covenant'
programme.desc: A look at "Alien: Covenant," a 2017 sci-fi thriller about a spaceship crew that encounters dangerous creatures while exploring a seemingly idyllic world. The film stars Michael Fassbender, Katherine Waterston and Billy Crudup, and is directed by Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Blurb. Selina works on her book as her staff prepare for the ceremony to unveil her portrait. Meanwhile, Jonah tries to weasel his way onto the guest list; and Dan struggles to solve his on-screen chemistry problem(n)

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: In this action epic set during the Han dynasty, a Chinese commander joins forces with a Roman general to protect China's sovereignty from a power-hungry villain(n)

programme.title: The Night Of

Meanwhile, Stone visits Naz's parents to negotiate a fee for his services; and Box counsels a police officer on how to write up his report on the night of the arrest(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: In this icy and stylish sci-fi thriller, a dying New York real-estate tycoon (Ben Kingsley) undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man (Ryan Reynolds), but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body(n)

programme.title: High Maintenance
programme.desc: Grandpa. A Midwestern transplant experiences culture shock when he settles in Queens with his dog, but an eccentric dog walker makes them feel right at home(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Hilary Swank adds another outstanding characterization to her Oscar-winning résumé. She plays Holly Kennedy, a young widow whose late husband (Gerard Butler) arranged to have 10 letters delivered posthumously to encourage her to carry on with her life. Directed by Richard LaGravenese, who cowrote the moving script with Steven Rogers. The film is an adaptation of Cecelia Ahern's popular first novel, which she wrote when she was 21(n)

programme.title: HBO Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Ray Romano. Ray Romano mines humor from the experiences of his 2-year-old twin sons ("terrorists using sleep deprivation to break me"). Taped in San Francisco(n)

programme.title: Wildcats
programme.desc: Blonde-haired, blue-eyed women's libber Molly McGrath (Goldie Hawn) quits her teaching job at a comfortable middle-class school to take a new position as varsity football coach at a predominantly black inner-city school. Culture and gender clashes abound; she must win over the hard-boiled youths, convince them to practice hard and show up for class, and convince them they can win football games. Her job begins to take a toll on her family, however, when her ex-husband (James Keach) attempts to take away her daughter, claiming she is neglecting her responsibilities as a mother. Wildcats marked the fourth sports film directed by Michael Ritchie(n)

programme.title: The World According to Garp
programme.desc: The life of T S Garp, and his mother, Jenny. Whilst Garp sees himself as a serious writer, Jenny writes a feminist manifesto at an opportune time, and finds herself as a magnet for all manner of distressed women(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina (Jennifer Saunders) and Patsy (Joanna Lumley) are horrified when they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. Eager to avoid the media's glare, the duo flee to the French Riviera to get away from it all. Directed by Mandie Fletcher(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie'
programme.desc: A look at "Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie," a 2016 adaptation of the popular British sitcom about hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy, who flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher(n)

programme.title: Dane Cook: Vicious Circle
programme.desc: The concert film Dane Cook: Vicious Circle captures the popular comic delivering his observational humor to an enthusiastic hometown crowd in Boston, MA. Cook touches on a variety of topics including arguing with a significant other. This special originally aired in September of 2006 on Home Box Office a month before his feature film Employee of the Month hit theaters(n)

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which bickering curmudgeons Max and John find plenty more to disagree about - notably the marriage of their respective offspring and the arrival of a sexy Italian woman and her mother, who plan to turn the bait shop into a restaurant. Max and his bawdy old father put John's nose further out of joint by falling for the new arrivals(n)

programme.title: Bushwhacked
programme.desc: Outdoor comedy about an incompetent delivery man who hides out in a scout camp when he is wrongly accused of murder. He decides to continue the pretence of being a scout leader, little anticipating having to face dizzying clifftops, raging rapids and angry bears in what turns out to be the challenge of a lifetime(n)

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy
programme.desc: Wild and wacky comedy-musical starring Geena Davis as a young woman whose life changes beyond her wildest dreams when three brightly-coloured aliens crash into her swimming pool. The aliens are played by Jeff Goldblum, Damon Wayans and, in a very early role, one Jim Carrey(n)

programme.title: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising
programme.desc: Young parents Mac and Kelly find that their neighbor troubles are far from over when a hedonistic sorority moves in next door in this hysterical comedy sequel. During their feud with the ladies, the couple team up with ex-fratboy Teddy, who tormented them the last time around(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: Back in the late 1970s, author Cameron Crowe banked upon his youthful appearance to pose as a teen-aged high school student. The results of his hands-on research was the revelatory book Fast Times at Ridgemont High, which went on to spectacular success as a theatrical feature. The sociological inner lining of Crowe's book was sacrificed in favor of standard teen-movie dialogue and Animal House-style comedy, but the film is impossible to dislike, and it spawned a legion of future imitators. Ostensibly, the main characters are brother and sister Jennifer Jason Leigh and Judge Reinhold. However, the real breakthrough star is Sean Penn as the perpetually zoned-out Jeff Spicoli. It is Penn who has the film's most famous scene, wherein the decorum of teacher Hand (Ray Walston)'s classroom is interrupted by a pizza delivery. Fast Times at Ridgemont High was spun off into a TV series, the short-lived 1986 weekly Fast Times(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Toula's family throws an even bigger Greek wedding for her parents, who learn they never officially tied the knot. Meanwhile, she tries to spice up her own marriage and deals with a daughter who's eager to escape from her overbearing clan(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina (Jennifer Saunders) and Patsy (Joanna Lumley) are horrified when they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. Eager to avoid the media's glare, the duo flee to the French Riviera to get away from it all. Directed by Mandie Fletcher(n)

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy
programme.desc: Wild and wacky comedy-musical starring Geena Davis as a young woman whose life changes beyond her wildest dreams when three brightly-coloured aliens crash into her swimming pool. The aliens are played by Jeff Goldblum, Damon Wayans and, in a very early role, one Jim Carrey(n)

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: In this irreverent spin on the superhero genre, a mercenary reinvents himself as a wisecracking antihero called Deadpool after an experiment leaves him with advanced healing powers and a disfigured face. He then sets out to seek revenge on those responsible for his transformation(n)

programme.title: Life with Mikey
programme.desc: A former child actor turned talent agent is hired to find a young girl to appear in a national advertisement. During his search, he discovers a charming young pickpocket who renews his interest in his career and his love of life in this light, sentimental comedy(n)

programme.title: The Man with Two Brains
programme.desc: A madcap brain surgeon, married to a beautiful but evil woman, falls in love with the brain of another lady who has everything he wants - except a body(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). The eternally irritable Ms. Carrigan (Cathy Moriarty) discovers that the only thing she's been left in her recently departed father's will is a rickety old house in New England. Naturally, the woman is furious about this, until her "close personal friend" and assistant, Dibbs (Eric Idle of Monty Python fame), discovers a secret message that a treasure may be concealed somewhere in the house. The two take off for Maine, only to learn that the house is haunted by Casper "the friendly ghost" and his three ghostly uncles Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso. After futilely recruiting an exorcist (Don Novello, more or less reviving his Father Guido Sarducci character from Saturday Night Live) and a "professional ghost exterminator" (Dan Aykroyd), she brings in a "ghost psychiatrist" (Bill Pullman) and his daughter Kat (Ricci). Innocently attracted to the young girl, Casper befriends Kat as they try to save the ghosts' home from the evil Carrigan. Eye-popping special effects highlight this magical story that touches (albeit lightly) on the theme of what lies at the heart of human desires. Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Mel Gibson and The Crypt Keeper (of Tales from the Crypt) all make cameos as apparitions in the mirror Bill Pullman looks into in the house(n)

programme.title: Ellen DeGeneres: The Beginning
programme.desc: Perhaps best-known for "coming out" to American audiences on her sitcom Ellen in 1997, Ellen Degeneres has been a force in comedy for many years. This film profiles her return to stand-up comedy in New York. This HBO special finds the talented comedian musing on subjects from sex to fashion and friends(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: Two Puerto Rican cops are asked by a pair of French fashion designers to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag(n)

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Spike Lee received an Oscar nomination for his screenplay about racial tensions in a New York City neighbourhood(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: In this offbeat love story, a woman falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While she believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Net Neutrality in the U.S. Net neutrality in the U.S.; the American Health Care Act of 2017; and Eminem's court fight with New Zealand's National Party are discussed(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor
programme.desc: Jimmie is seeing his single friends get married one by one. Not something he's worried about, until his current girlfriend Anne catches the bouquet at his friend Marco's wedding. Feeling his wild partying days are numbered, he proposes to Anne, but botches the proposal so badly that Anne leaves town, insulted by his apparently defeatist attempt to tie the knot. After she's gone, Jimmie discovers that his recently-deceased grandfather's will stipulates he gets nothing of a multi-million dollar fortune unless he's married by 6.05pm on his 30th birthday, the very next day! Can he beat the clock in time to claim his inheritance?(n)

programme.title: Crooklyn
programme.desc: Portrait of a close-knit black family living in 1970s Brooklyn, as seen through the eyes of the youngest daughter. This comedy-drama follows them as they deal with money woes, eccentric neighbors and the sons' troublemaking(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip in this incredibly raunchy comedy(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: In this offbeat love story, a woman falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While she believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd returns as Elwood Blues in this long-awaited sequel to the 1980 comedy. After 18 years in prison and death of his brother Jake, Elwood is on a new "Mission from God"--- to reunite the old band and give a troubled orphan a new lease on life. Joe Morton, J. Evan Bonifant, Nia Peeples, Kathleen Freeman, Frank Oz, Steve Lawrence, Erykah Badu, Darrell Hammond. Directed by John Landis(n)

programme.title: Problem Child
programme.desc: Fast-paced slapstick comedy about a young boy who brings catastrophe into the household of the unsuspecting young couple who adopt him. The parents are initially drawn to the boy because of his bow tie, not realising that he wears it to emulate his hero, the 'Bow-Tie Killer', and from that point their hopes for a sweet and loving child begin to fall apart(n)

programme.title: Simon Birch
programme.desc: Ian Michael Smith is a tiny bundle of joy as the star of this moving tale of friendship and faith. Simon Birch is a boy so small that at age 12 he plays the infant Jesus in a Christmas pageant. But Simon believes God has a special plan for him and sets out on a spiritual quest, joined by his best friend. Ashley Judd, Oliver Platt, Joseph Mazzello, Jim Carrey(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show(n)

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Jim Carrey and Virginia Madsen star in this dark psychological thriller from director Joel Schumacher (The Phantom of the Opera, Batman & Robin). Walter Sparrow is leading a contented life until his wife Agatha innocently gives him a battered old paperback as a gift. As he reads, Sparrow is astonished by the parallels between his life and that of the novel's protagonist, Fingerling. But as the plot progresses it grows darker, featuring themes of transgressive sex, suicide and murder. It also hinges around Fingerling's obsession with the number 23 - a prime number that seems to pop up everywhere in the universe once you start to notice it. It's not long before 23 takes a similar hold on Sparrow. And, when he begins unjustly to view Agatha in the same distrustful light that Fingerling views his own spouse Fabrizia, it seems as if Sparrow has locked on to the same tragic trajectory as the story's lead character. Or can he find a way to wrench himself from the novel's grip?(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: When the first manned flight to Mars ends in mysterious circumstances, astronauts Jim McConnell and Woody Blake make a treacherous journey to the Red Planet to investigate(n)

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Riotous humor goes to the mat in this bone-crushing, pro-wrestling comedy. When their favorite rasslin' star is banished from the sport, two sewer workers (David Arquette, Scott Caan) flush out a plan to get their depressed hero back in the ring for good. Oliver Platt, Joe Pantoliano, Rose McGowan(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: This action-packed buddy picture pairs Keats, a black police officer, with a wiseacre white drug-runner named Archie Moses. Working undercover, Keats is assigned to become friends with Moses in order to capture his boss, drug-lord Frank Colton. Keats' problems begin when Moses finds out about the sting(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day(n)

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: Gothic horror story set in modern-day San Francisco about a two-hundred-year-old vampire who decides to reveal all about his existence to an increasingly beguiled tabloid journalist. Weary with wandering the world in search of fresh prey, the blood-sucking fiend takes time out to recall vignettes from a past life that embraces two centuries and four continents(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Hugely successful businesswoman Michelle Darnell (Melissa McCarthy) is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she is forced to move in with a long-suffering employee of hers (Kristen Bell), and tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. Peter Dinklage, Kristen Schaal, and Kathy Bates co-star in this comedy, which was directed by Ben Falcone (McCarthy's real-life husband), and co-written by McCarthy, Falcone, and Steve Mallory(n)

programme.title: Introducing the Dwights
programme.desc: Off-kilter coming-of-age comedy about an overbearing matriarch who sees her son's new girlfriend as a threat to their not-so-perfect family life(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: In Jonathan Lynn's fish-out-of-water comedy, after a pair of young men are falsely accused of murder in a small Alabama town, they call for the help Vinny Gambini, a tough-talking Brooklyn lawyer with no previous trial experience(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Witch Queen, who has returned from the dead, in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: The people of Covington, a small town in rural Pennsylvania lead peaceful lives, only rarely disturbed by the creatures that inhabit the woods surrounding the village. An agreement has been reached with the creatures and peace prevails under the condition that the boundaries are respected. Yet this balance is disrupted when Lucius Hunt (Joaquin Phoenix), an inquisitive and willful young man, ventures himself beyond the limits of the village. After this, things will never be the same. Written and directed by M. Night Shyamalan, this is his third film after the huge success of The Sixth Sense(n)

programme.title: Taking Care of Business
programme.desc: A convicted car thief walks away from minimum security prison after winning tickets to the world series. When he finds a wealthy businessman's planner, he takes a trip to return the items - on the businessman's dime and name(n)

programme.title: New Best Friend
programme.desc: Tense drama about a deputy sheriff investigating the drug overdose of a poor girl who fell in with the rich crowd as part of a class experiment at a prestigious Southern university. But the lawman finds that everyone who knew her has a different tale of her predicament(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: Sometimes a family title, among the nobility of England, goes to the "collateral" heirs -- people not in the direct line of decent, like cousins, great-nephews and the like. On rare occasions, these people are not even aware that they are about to be elevated to the House of Lords, and they have been living more-or-less ordinary lives. In this comedy, the family which lacks direct heirs is the Royal Family of England -- as all of the likely heirs have died one after the other in swift succession. In this comedy, the "collateral heir" is an exuberant, fence-busting All-American slob (and pretty good rock n' roll musician) by the name of Ralph (John Goodman). Unknown to him, his grandmother had an affair with a royal prince. Ralph's a good guy, and eager to please. He recognizes the importance of the royal hoopla to England and works very hard to fit in as its new designated king. He is assisted by the ever-unctuous, very serious family factotum Willingham (Peter O'Toole). The trouble is, he doesn't have instincts for politics English-style, and he is constantly "putting a foot wrong," as they might say. The most difficult situation for him is when he develops a new love interest, and she's not "acceptable" to the upper crust. In addition to being hounded by the tabloids, he finds that "the good of the state" requires that he drop his new girlfriend. Things really come to a head just before Ralph's coronation as king. Reviewers generally loathed this feel-good comedy, but audiences seem to have enjoyed it tremendously, and it has done well in video and TV airings(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, in his breakthrough role, stars as Joel Goodson, a straight-A student left in charge of the house by his holidaying parents. Grabbing the Porsche, he heads downtown and picks up a glamorous hooker. She's on the run from her pimp and when she sees Joel's house, she has an idea: seduce him and persuade him to turn it into a high class bordello for just one night, so she and her friends can relieve his friends of their cash. All goes well until her pimp turns up looking for payback in Paul Brickman's sex comedy that rises above the genre to be both entertaining and provoking(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: NewZealandTown. The prime minister of New Zealand wants to create 'New Zealand Town' in the bit between Chinatown and Little Italy. The boys want to play at the grand opening but he wants someone more cool - so Murray gets hold of some hair gel(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: FedEx employee Chuck Noland lives his life by clockwork. But his promise to his girlfriend to be back from Moscow for New Year looks doubtful when a terrifying plane crash strands him in the middle of the Pacific. An elemental drama of hope and survival(n)

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Sociopathic death-row inmate Jerico Stewart (Kevin Costner) is implanted with the memories of a deceased CIA agent (Ryan Reynolds) in a desperate attempt to thwart a deadly plot involving a Dutch hacker (Michael Pitt). At the same time, Jerico reconnects with his own humanity as he bonds with the late agent's family. Gary Oldman, Tommy Lee Jones, and Gal Gadot co-star in this espionage thriller directed by Ariel Vromen (The Iceman)(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: Tris and Four journey beyond the wall surrounding Chicago, and get caught up in a battle for the fate of humanity(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: A skydiving instructor is plunged into a web of deception and espionage when one of his students dies in a freefalling accident(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: In desperate need of a vacation after being unceremoniously dumped by his TV-star girlfriend, a man travels to a lavish Hawaiian resort to nurse his wounds and forget his heartache, only to discover that his ex and her handsome new boyfriend are currently staying at the exact same island hot spot. Peter Bretter (Jason Segel) may be just another struggling musician, but for the past six years he's been dating Sarah Marshall (Kristen Bell), one of the hottest stars on television. Sarah is everything in the world to Peter, so when she kindly but firmly tells him that they should each go their separate ways, he is absolutely devastated. Later, after attempting to salvage his ego by awkwardly attempting to become a womanizer and nearly losing his job because of a nervous breakdown, an emotionally fragile Peter attempts to put the past behind him by escaping to the sun-soaked beaches of Oahu. While at first it seems as if Peter has discovered the perfect prescription for a bad case of lost love, his plan soon turns to dust when Sarah and her new rock-star boyfriend, Aldous (Russell Brand), turn up at the exact same resort. Though accepting Sarah's lavish new lifestyle won't be easy for the crestfallen Peter, the laid-back companionship of flirtatious resort employee Rachel (Mila Kunis) -- not to mention a continuous regimen of fruity cocktails -- goes a long way in mending the wounds of a broken heart. Forgetting Sarah Marshall was penned by Segel and produced by Judd Apatow. Fun with Dick and Jane screenwriter Nicholas Stoller makes his directorial debut. The cast also includes Paul Rudd, Bill Hader, Jack McBrayer, and Jonah Hill(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Chronicle of the seminal rap group N.W.A. and their 'hood-to-riches success, tracing their story from the mean streets of mid-'80s Compton to their triumphant battles against censorship(n)

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Offbeat crime comedy. Obsessive-compulsive con artist Roy and his ambitious protege Frank are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when Roy's life is suddenly complicated by the unexpected arrival of his teenage daughter. While her appearance threatens to disrupt his carefully ordered life, he comes to feel fatherly affection for her - and she in turn develops a fascination with his work(n)

programme.title: The Cell
programme.desc: In Tarsem Singh's psychological thriller, Jennifer Lopez plays a child psychiatrist who is part of a team that has developed a drug-induced method to literally get inside disturbed children's minds to help them. Then FBI agent Vince Vaughn asks for her help - serial killer Vincent D'Onofrio is in custody but in a coma and unless she can unlock the secrets of his mind, an imprisoned girl will be his next victim in hours. Using visual techniques ranging from sci-fi influences to Bosch, Singh's audacious film is a stunning, chilling tour-de-force(n)

programme.title: Dying Young
programme.desc: Melodramatic love story in which a directionless young woman becomes nurse to a 28-year- old man who is dying of leukaemia. Although the man's stern father is initially wary of her, nurse and patient become close, and eventually love blossoms(n)

programme.title: The Mothman Prophecies
programme.desc: Based on a book by paranormal investigator John Keel, this spooky, X-Files-type supernatural thriller is purportedly based loosely on true events that occurred in the small town of Point Pleasant, WV, in 1966-1967. Richard Gere stars as journalist John Klein, an up-and-coming reporter devastated by the death of his beloved wife Mary (Debra Messing) following a car accident. Mary saw a mysterious vision immediately before the crash, a haunting image of a moth-like creature. Two years later, Klein is driving to an interview with the governor of Virginia when he suddenly finds himself hundreds of miles out of his way in a small town on the West Virginia-Ohio border. He discovers that strange events are occurring there, including sightings of the "mothman," as well as UFOs and bizarre alien-like telephone calls. Klein stays to investigate, despite the protests of skeptical cop Connie Parker (Laura Linney) and the initial hostility of spooked local Gordon (Will Patton). He soon discovers that sightings of the mothman are historical portents of doom and disaster, omens that may foretell a terrible cataclysm about to strike Point Pleasant. The Mothman Prophecies reunites Gere and Linney, who previously starred together in Primal Fear (1996)(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, in his breakthrough role, stars as Joel Goodson, a straight-A student left in charge of the house by his holidaying parents. Grabbing the Porsche, he heads downtown and picks up a glamorous hooker. She's on the run from her pimp and when she sees Joel's house, she has an idea: seduce him and persuade him to turn it into a high class bordello for just one night, so she and her friends can relieve his friends of their cash. All goes well until her pimp turns up looking for payback in Paul Brickman's sex comedy that rises above the genre to be both entertaining and provoking(n)

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: In this cryptic sci-fi adventure, Roy rescues his son Alton from a religious cult in Texas, whose members worship the boy for his supernatural powers. Along with a state trooper, the pair go on a cross-country journey as they are hunted by federal agents, who believe Alton might be a threat to national security(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Eddie Mannix is a Hollywood 'fixer', and is part of the upcoming production starring superstar actor Baird Whitlock(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Former Saturday Night Live "Weekend Update" co-anchors Tina Fey and Amy Poehler co-star in this baby-fever comedy about a single, career-oriented woman who previously put parenthood on hold, and is forced to hire a surrogate mother when she discovers there is only a one-in-a-million chance that she will be able to get pregnant. Kate Holbrook (Fey) is a 37-year-old business executive who has always put her professional life before her personal life, but these days her biological clock is ticking louder than ever before. As with everything else she has accomplished in life, Kate is determined to have a child on her own terms. Unfortunately for Kate, the chance of her ever becoming pregnant is slim to none. Undaunted, a willful Kate drafts South Philly working-class girl Angie Ostrowiski (Poehler) -- a woman who may just be her polar opposite -- to be a surrogate mother. Subsequently informed by the head of the surrogacy center (Sigourney Weaver) that her surrogate is indeed pregnant, the excited mother-to-be soon purchases every child-rearing book she can find and excitedly begins the nesting process. But life hasn't quit throwing Kate curveballs just yet, because when a pregnant Angie shows up on her doorstep with no place to live, the woman who once thrived on order finds her life descending into chaos. Now, as Kate attempts to transform Angie into the ideal expectant mother, this odd couple will discover that families aren't always biological, but occasionally formed through friendship as well. Writer Michael McCullers, who authored the screenplays for Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me and Undercover Brother in addition to working on Saturday Night Live, makes his feature directorial debut with a self-penned screenplay(n)

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, bumbling private eye Holland March (Ryan Gosling) and muscle-for-hire Jackson Healy (Russell Crowe) become unlikely partners when they find themselves both looking for a missing woman named Amelia (Margaret Qualley) following the death of a high-profile porn star. Amelia's ties to the deceased actress are unclear, but as other members of the porn industry turn up dead, March and Healy's investigation reveals a much bigger conspiracy than the duo could have ever anticipated. With the help of March's teenage daughter Holly (Angourie Rice), their sleuthing eventually unearths corruption within the federal government. Shane Black (Iron Man 3) directed and co-wrote this action buddy comedy, which co-stars Kim Basinger and Matt Bomer(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) races to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by members of the very organization he was hired into as director Paul Greengrass brings author Robert Ludlum's popular character back to the big screen for his third feature outing. David Strathairn, Julia Stiles, Joan Allen, and Paddy Considine co-star(n)

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: This powerful drama follows the fate of four young altar boys in 1960s New York, whose childish prank goes tragically wrong. Sentenced to several arduous months in a reform school, the boys suffer unimaginable abuse at the hands of sadistic guard Sean Nokes (Kevin Bacon) and his cohorts, abuse which is to scar them mentally for the rest of their lives. As adults, the four - Michael (Brad Pitt), Lorenzo (Jason Patric), Tommy (Billy Crudup) and John (Ron Eldard) - are unable to escape from their past and, when an unexpected chance for revenge presents itself, Tommy and John make full use of it. Now the heavy hand of the law is about to come down on the four men once again and only their old Father (Robert De Niro) and a shifty lawyer (Dustin Hoffman) may be able to save them(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: The people of Covington, a small town in rural Pennsylvania lead peaceful lives, only rarely disturbed by the creatures that inhabit the woods surrounding the village. An agreement has been reached with the creatures and peace prevails under the condition that the boundaries are respected. Yet this balance is disrupted when Lucius Hunt (Joaquin Phoenix), an inquisitive and willful young man, ventures himself beyond the limits of the village. After this, things will never be the same. Written and directed by M. Night Shyamalan, this is his third film after the huge success of The Sixth Sense(n)

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: Michael Haneke's American re-make of his 1997 German version loses none of the terror or horror in the translation. An all-American family - George, Ann and son Georgie - arrive at their summer cottage for a yachting holiday. Two polite young men, Paul and Peter introduce themselves as neighbours but suddenly and brutally instil a nihilistic, sadistic regime on the family, playing mind games and torturing them. Haneke famously makes the audience complicit to events, rewinding events, having Paul and Peter address the audience directly and making the violence happen off screen but having it still horribly audible in this claustrophobic nightmare(n)

Convinced that the game's current champion Val Birch (Larry Brandenberg) is cheating, Ellison asks Monk to investigate. The solution to the mystery rests in the fact that "Treasure Chest" host Roddy Lankman (John Michael Higgins) has recently murdered his personal assistant--but Monk will only be able to crack the case if he becomes a contestant himself. programme.desc: After the runaway success of Jeepers Creepers in 2001, it was inevitable there would be a sequel, but this is just as smart and scary as the original. The Creeper has just two days of his allotted 23 on earth left to both eat his fill and replenish body parts that have decayed during his enforced years of hibernation. Fortunately, a broken-down bus full of college basketball players and their cheerleaders should provide for his needs. As the students are picked off one by one, their only hope is local farmer Jack Taggart, who's out to avenge his son's death. Victor Salva's film is satisfyingly full of edge-of-the-seat moments, not to mention the required quota of gruesome deaths and gore(n)

programme.desc: The Pill. Jackie (Mila Kunis) thinks she's pregnant; Eric (Topher Grace), who had nothing to do with it, is the first to find out, and Kelso (Ashton Kutcher), who probably had everything to do with it, goes into a panic. Madge (Tanya Roberts) immediately respond to the news by putting Donna (Laura Prepon) on the pill -- but Donna's dad, Bob (Don Stark), isn't informed of this until the most inopportune (and most embarrassing) moment. But fear not: everything ends happily...at least almost everything. One Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In announcer Gary Owens has a hilarious cameo role(n)

In other disturbances in the Force, Donna (Laura Prepon) finds herself the romantic bone of contention between Eric (Topher Grace) and his old friend David (Scott Whyte) -- who happens to be the son of Red's (Kurtwood Smith) new boss -- and Laurie (Lisa Robin Kelly) is driven to a rash act out of sheer boredom(n)

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: "In space, no one can hear you scream." A close encounter of the third kind becomes a Jaws-style nightmare when an alien invades a spacecraft in Ridley Scott's sci-fi horror classic. On the way home from a mission for the Company, the Nostromo's crew is woken up from hibernation by the ship's Mother computer to answer a distress signal from a nearby planet. Capt. Dallas's (Tom Skerritt) rescue team discovers a bizarre pod field, but things get even stranger when a face-hugging creature bursts out of a pod and attaches itself to Kane (John Hurt). Over the objections of Ripley (Sigourney Weaver), science officer Ash (Ian Holm) lets Kane back on the ship. The acid-blooded incubus detaches itself from an apparently recovered Kane, but an alien erupts from Kane's stomach and escapes. The alien starts stalking the humans, pitting Dallas and his crew (and cat) against a malevolent killing machine that also has a protector in the nefarious Company(n)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: James Cameron took the helm for this frightening sequel, with Sigourney Weaver reprising her role as Ellen Ripley. After 57 years in deep sleep Ripley is rescued from the escape capsule of the starship Nostromo, the sole survivor of the alien attack. Back on Earth, she finds that the planet where she and her late crewmates first made contact has since been colonised, but all communication has been lost. Persuaded that the mission is to destroy the aliens, Ripley joins a group of marines sent to investigate. Inside the colonists' complex, they discover a terrified girl, Newt who reveals the truth; a group of aliens are using the human hosts to incubate. With most of the marines killed, Corporal Hicks takes charge and decides to nuke the planet. But when their shuttlecraft crashes, the survivors find shelter and and must hope their mother ship will pick them up before the raging fires consume the planet and cause a nuclear explosion..(n)

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Sigourney Weaver returns as Ripley in the third instalment of the series, as her escape pod (from the end of Aliens) crash lands on a penal planet. The crew and Newt are killed in the crash and Ripley, alone again, must convince both the prison staff and the prisoners that something alien has joined them. It's only when the killings begin that the prisoners believe Ripley's tale and join her in the battle for survival(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike joins forces with Scotland Yard when a gang of thieves turns up in Aidensfield, apparently plotting to steal a valuable horse from local trainer Kieron Doyle. The heroic copper doggedly pursues his quarry to the detriment of his relationship with Tricia - but tragedy strikes, leaving him heartbroken.(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Dr Ormerod finally accepts that wife Caroline isn't going to emerge from her coma and decides to move on. A married couple face the truth about their future, and Dr Weatherill is forced to break a distressing diagnosis to a patient, while Ken's organisational skills ensure the charity ball goes with a bang. Starring Michael Starke, Amy Robbins and Robert Daws, and featuring a guest appearance by Tricia Penrose in her Heartbeat guise of Gina Ward.(n)

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: The increasing elephant population presents Danny with a problem, but Mara's new owner Elliot Kriel offers a solution. Du Plessis is thrilled when his son Kirk brings news that his girlfriend Neema is pregnant, but his joy is short-lived when the couple announce their future plans - and the soon-to-be grandfather seeks solace in the bottle. A hen party of excitable young women, the first guests of the luxury lodge, proves invaluable when a group of rich, demanding bankers causes trouble. Drama, starring Stephen Tompkinson.(n)

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: A flu epidemic hits the depot, improving Stan's financial health as he and Jack clock up overtime. Vintage comedy, starring Reg Varney.(n)

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: The new depot nurse moves in as the Butlers' lodger - causing problems for Arthur. Vintage comedy, starring Reg Varney and Michael Robbins.(n)

programme.title: In Loving Memory
programme.desc: Lovelorn Billy misses a date with the new district nurse when Ivy insists that he takes her to play bowls.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike joins forces with Scotland Yard when a gang of thieves turns up in Aidensfield, apparently plotting to steal a valuable horse from local trainer Kieron Doyle. The heroic copper doggedly pursues his quarry to the detriment of his relationship with Tricia - but tragedy strikes, leaving him heartbroken.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica investigates when a gangster's attempt to take over a chef's new restaurant leads to murder, but the sleuth finds her involvement is resented by the detective assigned to the case. Angela Lansbury stars.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Newlyweds Mike and Ellie decide to build their dream home at a beauty spot called Gypsy's Acre, ignoring the warnings of elusive romany Mrs Lee about an ancient curse supposedly cast upon the land. The couple settle into their new life, but the mysterious woman makes her presence felt, subjecting them to a campaign of hatred in an attempt to force them out. Tragedy soon strikes, but as luck would have it Miss Marple is staying nearby with her recently widowed old friend Mrs Phillpot. However, if the spinster sleuth is to solve the puzzle, she must put her own life in grave danger. Murder mystery, starring Julia McKenzie, with Wendy Craig, Glynis Barber, Hugh Dennis, Tamzin Outhwaite, Tom Hughes, Joanna Vanderham, Aneurin Barnard, William Hope and Janet Henfrey.(n)

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: Morse meets his intellectual match when a serial killer haunting the streets of Oxford keeps himself one step ahead of the law and leaves cryptic messages to goad the police. At first glance, it seems to be the work of a deranged lunatic, but the elaborate staging of the crimes suggests method in the madness - and a macabre sharing of the sleuth's passion for opera. Starring Shaun Evans, with Roger Allam, Anton Lesser, Sean Rigby and James Bradshaw.(n)

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: The detective and his team embark on a race against time to recapture a dangerous convict who has escaped from Bodmin prison - a case that leads them to an elaborate drugs racket. Starring Jack Shepherd, Helen Masters, Jimmy Yuill and Sean Chapman.(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur's niece is set to be married and he has agreed to supply the wedding limousine - but her big day is placed in jeopardy when he finds he also needs the vehicle to shift a consignment of pornographic magazines. Warren Clarke guest stars, with George Cole and Dennis Waterman.(n)

programme.title: The Car Chasers
programme.desc: Jeff Allen goes after a classic Ferrari Mondial, and tells Meg he wants to launch an auto show in Lubbock.(n)

programme.title: TT 2017
programme.sub-title: Isle of Man TT: Record Breakers.
programme.desc: Craig Doyle introduces highlights of last year's race, when the duel between Ian Hutchinson and Michael Dunlop provided lasting memories and astonishing lap times.(n)

programme.title: Cycling
programme.sub-title: Cycling: Tour Series Highlights: 2017 Durham: Round Nine.
programme.desc: Ned Boulting presents action from the ninth and penultimate round of the series, which took place in the city of Durham. With commentary by Marty McCrossan and Tony Gibb.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: John Inverdale presents coverage of the third day of the Grand Slam tournament at Roland Garros, where the first-round matches are set to conclude. British number one Andy Murray had to come back from two sets down to eventually defeat Radek Stepanek at this stage last year, before top seed and eventual champion Novak Djokovic enjoyed a considerably more comfortable straight-sets victory over Lu Yen-hsun. In the women's event, there was a shock 6-2, 3-6, 6-3 defeat for third seed Angelique Kerber against Kiki Bertens. It was just four months after Kerber had tasted glory in the Australian Open and the German recovered from that setback to also claim the US Open title later in the year, meaning she will be among the favourites to prevail this time around. With analysis from Marion Bartoli, Jim Courier, Mark Petchey, Fabrice Santoro and Sam Smith, commentary by Nick Mullins and reports from Celina Hinchcliffe.(n)

programme.title: TT 2017
programme.sub-title: Isle of Man TT: The Perfect Lap.
programme.desc: Profiles of past and present lap record-holders on the Isle of Man TT's mountain course, including John Surtees, Mick Grant, Carl Fogarty and John McGuinness.(n)

programme.title: Cycling
programme.desc: Ned Boulting presents action from the 10th and final round of the series, which took place on a course in the centre of the Hertfordshire town of Stevenage.(n)

programme.title: Better Late Than Never
programme.desc: The group visit Phuket in Thailand on the final leg of their trip, taking part in a wild water fight before celebrating Terry's 67th birthday.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: Riggs and Murtaugh investigate a series of violent crimes with one thing in common - the victims are all members of the same church. While working on the case, Riggs faces more personal anguish as the first anniversary of Miranda's death sends him to a new low. Elsewhere, Roger and Trish disagree with Roger Jr about his future.(n)

programme.desc: Hannah East, darts reporter Dan Dawson and former players champion Paul Nicholson share their take on the latest news, facts and rankings, focusing on the Premier League finals.(n)

programme.desc: The incomparable comedian performs a variety of sketches and magic tricks, joined by husky-voiced actress Joan Greenwood.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur looks forward to a big payout when an ex-con needs his help to recover the loot from a robbery committed 14 years earlier - but learns banks are not always as safe as they seem. Vintage comedy drama, guest starring Rula Lenska, Maurice Denman and Max Wall.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: John Inverdale presents coverage of the fourth day's play at Roland Garros in Paris, featuring the opening matches in the second round of the men's and women's singles. Andy Murray continued to do things the hard way at this stage last year, coming through a second successive five-setter by eventually defeating unheralded home wildcard Mathias Bourgue 6-2, 2-6, 4-6, 6-2, 6-3, Meanwhile, 2015 champion Stan Wawrinka beat Taro Daniel 7-6, 6-3, 6-4, before home favourite Richard Gasquet beat Bjorn Fratangelo 6-1, 7-6, 6-3. In the women's competition, eventual title-winner Garbine Muguruza comfortably overcame Myrtille Georges 6-2, 6-0, and there were also straight-set victories for 2014 runner-up Simona Halep, double Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova and second seed Agnieszka Radwanska against Zarina Diyas, Hsieh Su-wei and Caroline Garcia respectively. With analysis from Marion Bartoli, Jim Courier, Mark Petchey, Fabrice Santoro and Sam Smith, commentary by Nick Mullins and reports from Celina Hinchcliffe.(n)

programme.title: TT 2017
programme.sub-title: Isle of Man TT: My Greatest Moment.
programme.desc: A selection of the greatest moments in the history of the Isle of Man TT. Presented by Craig Doyle, with Steve Parrish and Steve Plater.(n)

programme.title: World Superbike Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the sixth round of the season, held at Donington Park.(n)

programme.title: World Rugby U20 Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Richard Henwood presents action from the opening fixtures at the tournament in Georgia, including England v Samoa, New Zealand v Scotland, Ireland v Italy and Australia v Wales.(n)

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: Preston and Shaw investigate a case of arson at a home shared by security guard Peter and recruitment consultant Lizzie. The testy relationship between Peter and his brother David, the owner of the house, provides the officers with a suspect, but the revelation that the two cohabitors may be in a secret relationship opens up new lines of enquiry. Drama, starring Ben Hull and Jane Antrobus.(n)

programme.title: Island at War
programme.desc: James confesses to the La Salles that he was responsible for Eugene's death and Sheldon discovers Zelda's hiding place in Cassie's shop, and urges her to flee the island. Philip is determined to get back to England and hatches an escape plan with the help of Wilf and James, but the day ends in disaster when the three men are arrested and sent to a prison in France. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Erica prepares to visit Andrew in Liverpool, leaving locum Nick Goodson in charge of the surgery, where he promptly endangers a patient with a serious misdiagnosis. Meanwhile, David watches dumbfounded as the old folks' outing he's organised is reduced to a shambles by a pair of runaway pensioners in a stolen coach. Drama, starring Gary Mavers, Saskia Wickham, Adrian Lukis and Geoffrey Bayldon.(n)

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Immigration officers working with the police and a private security firm swoop on immigrants working without visas, but the force used to restrain one worker leads to his death.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Robert feels Christine is keeping him at arm's length, while Cathy needs his shoulder to cry on after a weekend in London with Mike leaves her with mixed feelings about their on-off relationship. Jack encourages David to ask for a transfer to surgery, and Stuart makes it clear he wants nothing more to do with Louise. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack and Michael Kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick moves up a rank to Sergeant and Blaketon becomes the new postmaster, while Greengrass threatens revenge on the miscreant responsible for dosing his beloved dog Alfred with rat poison. Rural drama, starring Nick Berry and Bill Maynard.(n)

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: A stripper meets a nasty fate when she confides that she has overheard a conversation about the murder of a wealthy countess. Michael Gambon stars in this instalment of the detective drama, featuring an early screen appearance by Minnie Driver.(n)

programme.title: Monsignor Renard
programme.desc: Drama series set during the dark days of the Second World War, starring John Thaw as Augustin Renard, a priest whose return from the Spanish Civil War coincides with a victorious German Army's invasion of his native France. With Cheryl Campbell, Jimmy Yuill and Alfred Lynch.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Andrew stops dithering and proposes to Erica, but his mind is soon distracted from romance by the plight of a priest suffering from a mystery illness. While he's wondering what course of action to take, Nick continues his scheming and David becomes increasingly concerned about Clare's mental state, fearing she's about to be overtaken by manic depression again. Gary Mavers, Saskia Wickham and Adrian Lukis star.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass starts a devious plot involving the postal service, much to Blaketon's annoyance, and several people are suspected of attacking a TV repair man. Rural drama, starring Nick Berry and Bill Maynard.(n)

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Cade's attitude to firearms is challenged after an armed robbery on a countryside mansion.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Christine doesn't do herself any favours in the popularity stakes, telling Louise she might not have a job to come back to once she has had the baby, and accusing Robert of taking Jack's side in a problematic case. Meanwhile, Kate gets a final warning after leaving a patient choking, and David makes plans for a party in celebration of his move into surgery. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw and Niamh Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The death of an unpopular art dealer leaves Poirot with a long list of suspects within his tangled, squabbling family - even though his eccentric wife had predicted his end. Detective drama, starring David Suchet, with Emma Fielding, Fiona Walker and Jeremy Northam.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Jewel Robbery at the Grand Metropolitan.
programme.desc: On doctor's orders, the dapper Belgian sleuth visits Brighton for what he hopes will be a relaxing holiday, but it leads to one of the most absorbing cases he has ever faced - the disappearance of a cache of jewels. Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Hermione Norris, Philip Jackson and Sorcha Cusack.(n)

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital
programme.desc: Lydia and Ruby visit a convent to make a seemingly miraculous diagnosis, but the treatment of a young nun and the senior doctor's interfering attitude creates tension between them, which finally erupts in a fierce confrontation. Maggie and Paul join a group of pilgrims on a trek through the jungle, hoping to find the answer to their prayers. Guest starring Madhur Jaffrey.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A murder at a remote cottage in Northumberland takes DCI Vera Stanhope back to a place full of childhood memories and reminds her of an unsolved case from earlier in her career. Delving into the local politics surrounding a controversial proposal to dig a quarry, she and her team find motives in the unlikeliest of places - until they realise that the truth could be hidden within the land itself. Detective drama, adapted from Ann Cleeves' novel The Crow Trap, guest starring Daniela Nardini (This Life) alongside Brenda Blethyn.(n)

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: A heartbroken Sidney agrees to help parishioner Isabel prepare for her wedding to Arthur, the new man in town, but the bride's stubborn mother, Daisy, proves to be a big impediment to the occasion as she believes the groom is out to kill her. When Daisy is then found dead, Mrs Maguire calls in Geordie to investigate, and Sidney finds himself dragged into the case - despite vowing to leave police business behind. While the victim seems to have died of natural causes, Arthur and Isabel are pushing for a fast cremation, suggesting the couple have something to hide. Jean Marsh and Isla Blair guest star.(n)

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Sidney is woken in the early hours by a fire in the village and, putting his life on the line, races to rescue Marion Taylor from the burning house, much to the relief of her husband Dominic. But there are questions surrounding the blaze - was it really an accident, and why was Marion so reluctant to leave? Normally Sidney would turn to Geordie to help solve a mystery like this, but he finds the detective is far from his usual self. When Dominic is then found stabbed to death, it's Geordie's junior, Atkins, who is sent to head up the case - and he's not exactly a fan of interfering vicars.(n)

programme.title: Marcella
programme.desc: The killer's next victim is a six-year-old girl, which devastates Marcella, and a DNA match gives the police team its strongest lead yet. Meanwhile, DI Tim Williamson investigates Andrew Barnes' death - was it really suicide? Crime drama, starring Anna Friel and Jamie Bamber.(n)

programme.title: Band of Gold
programme.desc: Part two of two. Lisa is lured back into prostitution by her former pimp Charlie with a plan to get money from her rich sister, Carol, while Raymond seeks revenge for his betrayal to the police. Rose realises that the murderer of the black prostitute is still out there. Powerful prostitution drama, starring Cathy Tyson and Geraldine James. Last in the series.(n)

programme.desc: Sent to investigate the murder of an American industrialist's wife found strangled in the kitchen of a plush hotel, Maigret initially suspects the killer may have been a member of staff - until fresh evidence makes him think again. Detective drama, starring Michael Gambon as the pipe-smoking sleuth.(n)

programme.title: Monsignor Renard
programme.desc: Madeleine reluctantly begins re-examining her attitude to the Germans and Renard is arrested for an act of resistance, forcing him into a battle of wills with the secret police. Wartime drama, starring John Thaw and Cheryl Campbell.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Andrew's terminally ill mother asks him to help end her life, while back in Cardale, the past catches up with scheming locum Dr Nick Goodson, exposing his web of lies and deceit in spectacular fashion. Gary Mavers, Saskia Wickham, Adrian Lukis and Thomas Lockyer star.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike has problems when a man held in custody drops dead. Bernie and Greengrass establish a taxi firm and look for ways to make a profit.(n)

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Cade faces a dilemma after a child is killed by joyriders on a local estate.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: New clinical director Jack tries to curry favour with Christine by criticising Robert's management skills, while David's first day in surgery doesn't go as well as he'd hoped. Mike returns from London wanting his old job back, but walks straight into a fiery situation with Cathy, who's none too pleased to see him. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack and David Harewood.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Jewel Robbery at the Grand Metropolitan.

Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Hermione Norris, Philip Jackson and Sorcha Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Adventure of the Clapham Cook.
programme.desc: The dapper Belgian detective, who usually only accepts cases of national importance, bends his rules for once and finds himself in run-down Clapham. He investigates the disappearance of a local cook and becomes intrigued by the contents of the woman's trunk. David Suchet stars, alongside Hugh Fraser and Brigit Forsyth.(n)

programme.title: Prime Suspect 1973
programme.desc: The mysterious Oz is brought into the station for questioning - but the suspect has been badly beaten, and hot-headed detective Gibbs is on the hook for the attack. The case takes an unexpected turn when another body is found in the canal, leaving Bradfield wondering whether they are looking at a double murder, while Tennison's integrity is tested when the DI asks her to make a decision that could have huge consequences for her career. Clifford Bentley and his sons start digging from the cafe to the bank, but they risk getting caught when David fails to notice the police outside.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A woman is murdered in a hedgerow but her son survives the attack, only to fall beneath the ice of a frozen pond as he makes his escape. DCI Vera Stanhope wades in and drags him out, and against all the odds he pulls through. As the investigation into the mother's killing unfolds, Vera finds a kindred spirit in the boy and comes to realise the key to solving the case lies deep in his memory. Detective drama, starring Brenda Blethyn, with Kerry Fox and Kieran O'Brien.(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: The investigators look back at the most shocking cases of the series, and relive the stories of despair, neglect, rescue and hope.(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: A look behind the closed doors of hoarder homes to find out how the Houston SPCA is tackling such animal cruelty.(n)

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: The case of Illinois high school student Lee Cutler, who went missing in October 2007 after failing to turn up at his part-time job at a music shop. His locked car was found almost 200 miles away containing clothes, a backpack, and blankets.(n)

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: Investigators discover a woman was stalked and murdered for her casino winnings when her decomposed body is found a month after her abduction.(n)

programme.title: Evil Online
programme.desc: The 2011 death of Eddie Leal, a 23-year-old professional bantamweight boxer, who set out in the middle of the night to meet an attractive girl he met online, but was later found dead in his car. Edmundo Guzman Jr was convicted of using a images of a female model in a false Facebook account to lure men to their deaths, simply for the thrill of killing.(n)

programme.title: Dateline with Tamzin Outhwaite
programme.desc: The deadly outcome that came after Kandi Hall embarked on an affair with her boss in response to her own husband's infidelity.(n)

programme.title: Six Degrees of Murder
programme.desc: The case of fashion designer Gianni Versace, who was fatally shot on the steps of his Miami Beach mansion in July 1997. The discovery of a body rolled up in a rug at an architect's apartment later sparked a hunt for the serial killer who had murdered him.(n)

programme.title: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: The case of Devon Guzman. When the 19-year-old's dead body was found in her car, it shocked her community. However, detectives soon discovered Devon's love life contained instances of jealousy and betrayal.(n)

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: How murder investigation experts reconstruct crimes from the remains of burnt evidence when the body of the victim has yet to be identified.(n)

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of 19-year-old student Katie Poirier, who vanished while working the graveyard shift at a petrol station. CCTV footage revealed an answer - but left a community in fear.(n)

programme.desc: The deadly outcome that came after Kandi Hall embarked on an affair with her boss in response to her own husband's infidelity.(n)

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: A case from Madrid, where 191 people were killed and more than 1,800 injured in a mass murder that became the deadliest Islamic attack in Western Europe to date.(n)

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Pablo Escobar, the most successful drug kingpin the world has ever seen. Plus, the scam artist who went from avid entrepreneur to managing and ripping off boy bands such as Backstreet Boys and NSYNC.(n)

programme.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: A case in which three members of a Taiwanese family living in Virginia disappeared. Rumour had it they died overseas, but investigators found answers closer to home.(n)

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The case of 62-year-old Narleen Campton, who was found murdered in her home, apparently having been tortured, during Thanksgiving 2011 in Newport, Washington. Though Jeremy Bryant confessed to his involvement, doubt remains over whether he acted alone.(n)

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of University of Florida student Christian Aguilar, who vanished from his campus in September 2012. Police were stumped until CCTV footage took the case in a shocking new direction, helping lead them to the 18-year-old's body.(n)

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: A case in which the pregnant teenage mistress of policeman James Kulbicki was found dead. Fellow officers believed he may have killed her to keep the affair quiet.(n)

programme.title: The Real Story with Maria Elena Salinas
programme.desc: The presenter recalls a case from 2004, when a daycare provider in Oregon was alarmed when two-year-old Karly Sheehan, who appeared to be losing her hair, claimed she was being abused at home.(n)

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: The case of 38-year-old Eric Franks, who vanished while preparing to move house with his long-lost high school girlfriend and the daughter they had together. However, he failed to called his mother after March 2011, leaving police struggling for answers as to his whereabouts.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Deadly Women
programme.desc: The motives and modus operandi of female murderers, focusing on those who take control of their prey.(n)

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A case in which a masked man robbing a house was interrupted by the daughter and father of the house - only to resort to horrific lengths to cover his crimes.(n)

programme.desc: The case of 45-year-old blues guitarist John Spira who vanished in February 2007, the day he had finalised his divorce. The investigation went cold, until a series of events thrust it back into the limelight.(n)

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: A forensic anthropologist identifies human remains found in the Mississippi River, and a professor uses a combination of bones and mathematics to solve a murder.(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Investigators respond to reports of a large amount of dogs being held captive in makeshift pens, and Octavio Gonzales receives a call about an abandoned horse.(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Chief investigator Charles Jantzen saves 37 dogs from a fire, and rescue technician Roman Leal searches a drain for some stranded puppies.(n)

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: The case of 21-year-old nursing student Maura Murray, who went missing in February 2004 minutes after being involved in a traffic collision. For no apparent reason she had driven 144 miles north from her campus and the accident was the second road incident she had suffered within two days.(n)

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: How stepbrothers Jamie McMahan and Chris Kauffman, responsible for a murder and robbery spree, were tracked down in Florida following a TV appeal for information.(n)

programme.title: Evil Online
programme.desc: The case of Angela, who fell in love soon after joining a dating site. A first date seemed to trouble her, and when she went out for a second time, she never returned.(n)

programme.title: Dateline with Tamzin Outhwaite

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets Michelle Parsons, an artist and teacher who decided to seize the day and build her own private hideaway in a woodland environment in Essex after she recovered from a serious illness. Together with her architect husband David, Michelle planned to construct a sleek, black-clad, three bedroom house complete with an art studio. However, torrential rain and a potentially disastrous gas leak stalled progress on the build, and as construction gets under way, Kevin wonders whether the couple's decision to eliminate windows on two sides of the property may leave them living in a gloomy bunker.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
